messages.title: Dear Neighbour,
messages.content: The Grays Walk-in service must remain open to serve residents when they need it. Thurrock's Tory MP supports closing the service. Can you afford for your family, parents or children to not have a walk-in service when they need it? We need change in Thurrock - a new, local MP who will stand up for your family and Thurrock's NHS services. Kind regards, Cllr Tim Aker

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Opposing the closure of the Grays Walk-in service and standing up for Thurrock's National Health Service.

issues.health: Opposing the closure of the Grays Walk-in service and standing up for Thurrock's National Health Service.

endorsements.endorsement: "I use the Grays Walk-in service and losing it would hurt me and my family. I'm supporting Tim Aker and UKIP to keep the service open. I am appalled the Tory MP wants to shut the service. Please consider supporting Tim in May to keep the service open."

images.caption: Tim Aker with a local resident expressing support for keeping the Grays Walk-in service open.
